title: The qu√¶ries examined, or, Fifty anti-queries seriously propounded to the people called Presbyterians Occasioned by the publication of Fifty queries, gathered out of the works of Mr. Rich. Baxter. By J. B. Wherein the principal allegations usually brought to support infant-baptism are discovered to be insufficient. By T. G.

notes: T. G. = Thomas Grantham; J. B. = John Barret, whose work is being attacked by the author.
